member.name: T:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating
member.summary: Provides access to jQuery Templating APIs.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.CreateTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the specified template markup.
member.param: The template markup.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.CreateTemplate(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the specified template markup.
member.param: The name to assign to the template.
The template markup.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.CreateTemplate(System.Html.Element)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the content of the specified element.
member.param: The element containing the template markup.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.CreateTemplate(System.String,System.Html.Element)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the content of the specified element.
member.param: The name to assign to the template.
The element containing the template markup.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.CreateTemplate(jQueryApi.jQueryObject)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set.
member.param: The jQueryObject representing the element whose content is to be used as a template.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.CreateTemplate(System.String,jQueryApi.jQueryObject)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set.
member.param: The name to assign to the template.
The jQueryObject representing the element whose content is to be used as a template.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.GetTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the template by name, previously created using CreateTemplate.
member.param: The template name.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.GetTemplateInstance(System.Html.Element)
member.summary: Gets the template instance associated with the specified element.
member.param: The element associated with a template.
member.returns: The associated template instance if one exists.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.GetTemplateInstance(jQueryApi.jQueryObject)
member.summary: Gets the template instance associated with the specified jQueryObject.
member.param: The jQueryObject associated with a template.
member.returns: The associated template instance if one exists.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.RenderTemplate(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set and instantiates it using the specified data.
member.param: The name of a template or markup to use.
The data associated with the template instance.
member.returns: The resulting elements from instantiating the template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.RenderTemplate(System.String,System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set and instantiates it using the specified data.
member.param: The name of a template or markup to use.
The data associated with the template instance.
An object for use inside the template as $item.
member.returns: The resulting elements from instantiating the template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.RenderTemplate(System.Html.Element,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set and instantiates it using the specified data.
member.param: The element whose content is to be used as a template.
The data associated with the template instance.
member.returns: The resulting elements from instantiating the template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplating.RenderTemplate(System.Html.Element,System.Object,System.Object)

The data associated with the template instance.
An object for use inside the template as $item.
member.returns: The resulting elements from instantiating the template.

member.returns: The resulting elements from instantiating the template.

member.name: T:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplate
member.summary: Represents a jQuery template that has been parsed and can be used to generate HTML.

member.name: T:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateObject
member.summary: Represents a jQuery result that wraps a set of elements, with templating APIs added.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateObject.CreateTemplate
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateObject.CreateTemplate(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a named template based on the first element of the matched set.
member.param: The name of the template.
member.returns: A compiled template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateObject.GetTemplateInstance
member.summary: Gets the template instance that the matched element is based on.
member.returns: The template instance.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateObject.RenderTemplate(System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set and instantiates it using the specified data.
member.param: The data associated with the template instance.
member.returns: The resulting elements from instantiating the template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateObject.RenderTemplate(System.Object,System.Object)
member.summary: Creates a template based on the first element of the matched set and instantiates it using the specified data.
member.param: The data associated with the template instance.
An object for use inside the template as $item.
member.returns: The resulting elements from instantiating the template.

member.name: T:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateInstance
member.summary: Represents an instantiated jQuery template.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateInstance.Update
member.summary: Updates the rendering once an update template has been set.

member.name: P:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateInstance.Data
member.summary: Gets the data that this instance is based on.

member.name: P:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateInstance.Nodes
member.summary: Gets the elements that this template instance represents.

member.name: P:jQueryApi.Templating.jQueryTemplateInstance.Template
member.summary: Gets or sets the template that this instance is based on.
